title: Carpetright secures funding ahead of equity raise
text:
May 11, 2018 / 6:38 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago Carpetright secures funding ahead of equity raise
LONDON (Reuters) - Carpetright ( CPRC.L ), the struggling British floor coverings retailer, said on Friday it has obtained a 15 million pounds shareholder loan to provide interim funding before a proposed 60 million pounds equity capital raising. FILE PHOTO: A sign hangs above the door of a Carpetright store in Derby, Britain January 19, 2018. REUTERS/Darren Staples/File Photo
The loan is the second one provided by Meditor European Master Fund Limited, Carpetrightâ€™s biggest shareholder with just under 30 percent.
Meditor loaned Carpetright 12.5 million pounds in March.
Carpetright confirmed it expected to launch the equity raise on or around May 18.
Last month creditors and shareholders of Carpetright backed a restructuring plan that involves 92 store closures and up to 300 job losses. Reporting by James Davey, Editing by Paul Sandle
